name: My Little Train Tic Tac Toe AR
name_original: My Little Train Tic Tac Toe AR
description:
Experience Tic Tac Toe in a new and Fun Augmented Reality way.

Play over any surface and try to beat the machine.

See what other players have to say:

****** "I love this app, it's like magic!"
****** "I like to see the Train very close and making him move."
****** "Making the world big is great, walking around it even better."

Features:
- Fun for all ages.
- 3 Different difficulty levels.
- Rotate.
- Zoom In/Out.
- Interact with your Little Train.
- Keep track of Wins, defeats and draws.
- HD graphics and sounds.

NOTE: Try to find a clear and well illuminated surface to play.
